Author: Portman#9202
Content: Investor question: How much did Binance pay you to post this tweet? https://twitter.com/KomodoPlatform/status/1177257973292392450?s=20  Komodo promoting one of the highest security ignorances possible in cryptocurrencies.

Author: Portman#9202
Content: You should have posted "Binance approached us with an offer of $XX to promote cryptocurrency users to leave KMD on Binance's Exchange. This is a very high security risk which we HIGHLY DISSAPPROVE OF. If you do not hold the security keys to your crypto, then it is not your crypto - it belongs to the exchange you store it on. Millions of dollars have been REGULARLY lost on exchanges via exit scams, corruption etc. the latest being QuadrigaCX. Instead we are doubling down on educating the masses about proper coin security and we call upon ALL cryptocurrencies developers to do the same. The most secure way to collect KMD Interest Rewards is using our AGAMA wallet. Thank you."

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: The most secure is ledger, and Agama is not "Ours" anymore.  They  never encouraged people to hold funds on an exchange, this post in my opinion was just formality, saying binance is doing the right thing by distributing the collected rewards which was not the case until now.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: You are not getting more on binance than you would get in your wallet, but from a day trader point of view, who are keeping KMD on binance on a daily basis, it's not a bad thing to get those rewards while trading KMD.

Author: Portman#9202
Content: The tweet itself enourages people to hold funds "Komodo is proud to be a member of the @binance Staking Platform."

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: No it is not. It suggests that if you do have kmd there, you will get the rewards same as if it was in your wallet.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: No one says to send it there and keep it there

Author: actionslacks#4072
Content: I think that documentation needs some dumbing down, or maybe just a "kmd for dummies" type page. but honestly, as more people get red pilled into crypto, It's a race to the bottom for the hearts and minds of the pre-programmed masses. Whenever you think you idiot proofed something, nature tends to evolve a better idiot.

Content: crypto itself is an esoteric concept to almost everyone. the details of how kmd has engineered many great solutions to as yet unforeseen problems just makes it that much more difficult to sell. But the Mobile Dex is the moon shot to mass adoption. seeing current progress makes me giddy in anticipation.

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: About the Binance tweet, Komodo isn't recommending Binance or suggesting that anyone store their funds on a CEX. But if KMD needs to be listed on CEXs (and it does) then it's best that users are able to earn their active user rewards, rather then the exchange itself taking those funds

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: It makes a lot more sense to stay friendly with Binance than to tweet some stuff about how we HIGHLY DISAPPROVE of them, which would be a quick way to get de-listed
